Proverbs__02.1: My son, if thou wilt receive my words, and wilt hide my commandments with thee,
Proverbs__02.2: That thy ear may hearken to wisdom: Incline thy heart to know prudence:
Proverbs__02.3: For if thou shalt call for wisdom, and incline thy heart to prudence:
Proverbs__02.4: If thou shalt seek her as money, and shalt dig for her as for a treasure:
Proverbs__02.5: Then shalt thou understand the fear of the Lord, and shalt find the knowledge of God.
Proverbs__02.6: Because the Lord giveth wisdom: and out of his mouth cometh prudence and knowledge.
Proverbs__02.7: He will keep the salvation of the righteous, and protect them that walk in simplicity.
Proverbs__02.8: Keeping the paths of justice, and guarding the ways of saints.
Proverbs__02.9: Then shalt thou understand justice, and judgment, and equity, and every good path.
Proverbs__02.10: If wisdom shall enter into thy heart, and knowledge please thy soul:
Proverbs__02.11: Counsel shall keep thee, and prudence shall preserve thee,
Proverbs__02.12: That thou mayst be delivered from the evil way, and from the man that speaketh perverse things:
Proverbs__02.13: Who leave the right way, and walk by dark ways:
Proverbs__02.14: Who are glad when they have done evil, and rejoice in most wicked things:
Proverbs__02.15: Whose ways are perverse, and their steps infamous.
Proverbs__02.16: That thou mayst be delivered from the strange women, and from the stranger, who softeneth her words:
Proverbs__02.17: And forsaketh the guide of her youth,
Proverbs__02.18: And hath forgotten the covenant of her God: for her house inclineth unto death, and her paths to hell.
Proverbs__02.19: None that go in unto her shall return again, neither shall they take hold of the paths of life,
Proverbs__02.20: That thou mayst walk in a good way: and mayst keep the paths of the just.
Proverbs__02.21: For they that are upright shall dwell in the earth, and the simple shall continue in it.
Proverbs__02.22: But the wicked shall be destroyed from the earth: and they that do unjustly shall be taken away from it.
